description: These meaty and cheesy snacks are simple and easily made.
name: Sausage Stuffed Zucchini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium zucchini, sliced in half, lengthways
1 small white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the zucchini in half lengthways and scoop out the flesh from the centre and set aside.
In a baking dish, place the passata at the bottom.
Heat up a non-stick pan with the oil and fry the sausage meat for 5 minutes while tossing.
Add the onion, garlic and zucchini flesh to the pan with the sausage meat and cook while mixing for another 5 minutes.
Take off the heat and transfer the mixture into each of the zucchini boats.
Cover with the grated cheese and place in the baking tray on top of the passata and bake for 30 minutes.
Remove from the oven and garnish with chives before serving.
